title: The Rescue Mission
description: Edward and Emily embark on a perilous mission to rescue Lila from the castle. They must navigate treacherous traps and avoid the vampire guards to reach their target.

sections.name: Setting up the Plan
sections.description: Edward, Emily, and Jasper gather in the secret library to plan Lila's rescue mission. They pour over maps of the castle, identifying potential entry points and escape routes.

sections.name: Navigating Treacherous Traps
sections.description: Edward, Emily, and Jasper make their way through the castle's winding corridors, avoiding deadly traps set by Caspian's guards. They use their wits and agility to overcome obstacles.

sections.name: Avoiding Vampire Guards
sections.description: Edward, Emily, and Jasper must evade the vampire guards patrolling the castle's narrow alleys. They move stealthily, using shadows and darkness to conceal themselves.

sections.name: Reaching Lila's Cell
sections.description: After navigating treacherous traps and avoiding vampire guards, Edward, Emily, and Jasper finally reach Lila's cell. They free her from her chains and prepare to make their escape.
